## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting your PR, please review and check the following:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run `cargo fmt` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `cargo clippy` and fixed all warnings

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added comments to Rust code (Rustdoc format)
- [ ] README has been updated (if needed)

### i18n (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added new translation keys to all language files
- [ ] English translations are complete
- [ ] Other language translations are marked with [TODO] if not complete

### Security
- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] Sensitive data is not exposed in logs or error messages
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or secrets

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR does not contain breaking changes
- [ ] OR: Breaking changes are documented in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] OR: Migration guide is provided for breaking changes
